Class StudentController

Object
StudentController
public class StudentController extends Object
controller class responsible for student-related internship operations handles internship searching, eligibility checking, application submission, acceptance actions, and withdrawal logic

  • Field Summary

    • StudentController

      public StudentController(InternshipRepository internshipRepo, InternshipAppRepository appRepo, UserRepository userRepo)
      construct controller with required repositories
      Parameters:
      internshipRepo - repository containing internship records
      appRepo - repository containing internship application records
      userRepo - repository containing user records

  • Method Details

    • getEligibleInternships

      public List<Internship> getEligibleInternships(Student s)
      retrieve list of eligible internships for student
      Parameters:
      s - student requesting results
      Returns:
      sorted list of eligible internships

    • getEligibleInternships

      public List<Internship> getEligibleInternships(Student s, InternshipFilter filter)
      retrieve list of eligible internships for student using additional custom filters
      Parameters:
      s - student requesting results
      filter - applied filter criteria
      Returns:
      sorted list of eligible internships matching both eligibility and filter rules

    • getInternshipApplications

      public List<InternshipApplication> getInternshipApplications(Student s)
      retrieve all internship applications created by the given student
      Parameters:
      s - student searching their applications
      Returns:
      list of internship applications submitted by student

    • getInternshipById

      public Internship getInternshipById(String internshipId)
      find internship by id
      Parameters:
      internshipId - internship identifier string
      Returns:
      internship if found, null otherwise

    • isLevelAllowed

      private boolean isLevelAllowed(Student student, Internship internship)
      check if student is permitted to apply to specified internship level year 1–2 students can only apply for BASIC level
      Parameters:
      student - student requesting validation
      internship - internship being evaluated
      Returns:
      true if permitted, false otherwise

    • applyInternship

      public void applyInternship(Student student, Internship internship)
      create new internship application for student
      Parameters:
      student - user applying
      internship - internship being applied for
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not approved
      IllegalStateException - if rules violated

    • acceptInternship

      public void acceptInternship(Student student, InternshipApplication internshipApplication, Internship internship)
      accept a successful internship application and auto-withdraw all others
      Parameters:
      student - requesting student
      internshipApplication - application being accepted
      internship - internship associated with application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not owned or not successful
      IllegalStateException - if student already accepted another internship

    • withdrawFromInternship

      public void withdrawFromInternship(Student student, InternshipApplication application)
      request withdrawal of an internship application if allowed
      Parameters:
      student - student requesting withdrawal
      application - application to modify
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if not owned or not eligible for withdrawal

    • getStudentById

      public Student getStudentById(String studentId)
      retrieve student by id
      Parameters:
      studentId - student identifier
      Returns:
      matching student or null if not found
